Memory Manager

Memory management and optimization system for GeminiSDR.

This module provides comprehensive memory monitoring, optimization, and cleanup utilities for both system RAM and GPU memory across different platforms.

class geminisdr.core.memory_manager.MemoryStats(total_ram_mb: float, available_ram_mb: float, used_ram_mb: float, ram_usage_percent: float, gpu_memory_mb: float | None = None, gpu_available_mb: float | None = None, gpu_usage_percent: float | None = None, swap_used_mb: float | None = None, process_memory_mb: float | None = None)[source]

MemoryManager

class geminisdr.core.memory_manager.MemoryManager(config: SystemConfig)[source]

Bases: object

System memory management and optimization.

System memory management and optimization with automatic resource monitoring.

Features:

  • Real-time memory usage monitoring

  • Dynamic batch size optimization based on available memory

  • Automatic memory cleanup and garbage collection

  • Memory-efficient context managers for large operations

  • GPU memory tracking and optimization

Example usage:

from geminisdr.core.memory_manager import MemoryManager

memory_manager = MemoryManager(config)

# Get current memory statistics
stats = memory_manager.get_memory_stats()
print(f"Available RAM: {stats.available_ram_mb} MB")

# Optimize batch size for available memory
optimal_batch = memory_manager.optimize_batch_size(32, model_size_mb=500)

# Use memory-efficient context
with memory_manager.memory_efficient_context():
    # Perform memory-intensive operations
    process_large_dataset()
__init__(config: SystemConfig)[source]

ModelCache

class geminisdr.core.memory_manager.ModelCache(max_size: int = 3, max_memory_mb: float = 2048, memory_manager: MemoryManager | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

LRU cache for ML models with memory-based eviction.

LRU cache for ML models with memory-based eviction policies.

Features:

  • Least Recently Used (LRU) eviction strategy

  • Memory-based cache size limits

  • Automatic model loading and caching

  • Memory usage tracking per cached model

Example usage:

from geminisdr.core.memory_manager import ModelCache

cache = ModelCache(max_size=3, max_memory_mb=2048)

# Models are automatically loaded and cached
model = cache.get_model("resnet50_v1")

# Cache handles eviction when limits are exceeded
cache.put_model("new_model", my_model)
